item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Nothing happens until something moves." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wayne W. Dyer
item.description: "Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change." -- Wayne W. Dyer

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Grateful Dead
item.description: "Sometimes you get shown the light in the strangest of places if you look at it right" -- Grateful Dead

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Gore Vidal
item.description: "Half of the American people have never read a newspaper. Half never voted for President. One hopes it is the same half." -- Gore Vidal

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle." -- Plato

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Melissa add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Try to understand men. If you understand each other you will be kind to each other. Knowing a man well never leads to hate and almost always leads to love." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and doors will open where you didn't know they were going to be." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Phish
item.description: "When you're there, I sleep lengthwise. And when you're gone, I sleep diagonal in my bed." -- Phish

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Government exists to protect us from each other. Where government has gone beyond its limits is in deciding to protect us from ourselves." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Felix Edmundovich Dzerzhinsky
item.description: "Trust, but verify." -- Felix Edmundovich Dzerzhinsky

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "To sit back hoping that someday, someway, someone will make things right is to go on feeding the crocodile, hoping he will eat you last - but eat you he will." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Michael First
item.description: "Live your life the way you Want Your kids to live theirs." -- Michael First

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit" -- E.E. Cummings
